data.text:
Lewis & Gillum Funeral Homes

202 Maple Ave., Oak Hill, Ohio 45656

(p) 740-682-6696

(f) 740-682-7862

(e) lewisgillumfh@gmail.com

(w) www.lewisgillum.com

Roger Jay Boggs, age 78, of Oak Hill, Ohio passed away November 27th, 2020 at Holzer Hospital of Jackson. He was born May 3rd, 1942 in South Webster, Ohio to the late Elton Ray Boggs and the late Evelyn Pauline (Toppins) Boggs.

Roger was a 1960 graduate of Oak Hill High School. After graduating he joined the U.S. Air Force and served for four years.

He is survived by two daughters, Terry Trivino of Oklahoma and Kimberly Wahlers of Indiana; as well as grandsons, Trevor Trevino and Connor Wahlers.

Roger was the eldest of eight boys. Surviving brothers include Ronnie (Roberta) Boggs, Richard Boggs, Randall (Viola) Boggs, Russell (Kathy) Boggs, and Rodney (Peggy) Boggs all of Oak Hill, Ohio and Timothy (Ann) Boggs of Gallipolis, Ohio.

In addition to his parents, he was preceded in death by his youngest brother, Brian Boggs of Oak Hill, Ohio and his former wife and mother of his children, Linda Martin Boggs of Oklahoma.

Funeral arrangements were under the direction of the Lewis & Gillum Funeral Home of Oak Hill.
